com.tokelon.toktales.core.engine

Interface IEngineLauncher

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAndroidEngineLauncher, IDesktopEngineLauncher, IWindowEngineLauncher
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidEngineLauncher, BaseEngineLauncher, DesktopEngineLauncher, WindowEngineLauncher

    public interface IEngineLauncher
    Creates, sets up and runs the engine.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void launch(Class<? extends IGameAdapter> adapter)
      Launches the engine with the given game adapter and the default setup.
      void launchWithSetup(Class<? extends IGameAdapter> adapter, IEngineSetup setup)
      Launches the engine with the given game adapter and setup.
      void terminate()
      Sets the launcher to stop the engine.
